item.title: Pavna Industries Stock Falls to 52-Week Low of Rs.23.16 Amidst Continued Downtrend
item.description: Pavna Industries, a player in the Auto Components & Equipments sector, touched a new 52-week low of Rs.23.16 today, marking a significant decline in its stock price amid a broader market environment that saw the Nifty index close marginally lower. This fresh low underscores ongoing pressures on the company’s share performance over the past year. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Network People Services Technologies Falls to 52-Week Low of Rs.1347.5
item.description: Network People Services Technologies has reached a new 52-week low, with its stock price touching Rs.1347.5 today. This marks a significant price level for the company within the Computers - Software & Consulting sector, reflecting ongoing pressures in its market performance. Time: 1 hour ago

item.title: Sensex and Nifty Slip Amid Mixed Sector Performance; Rail Vikas and Titan Lead Gains
item.description: The Indian equity markets concluded the session on 26 December 2025 with the Sensex and Nifty indices registering modest declines, reflecting a cautious investor sentiment amid mixed sectoral trends and subdued breadth. While large caps showed some resilience, mid and small caps faced pressure, with notable divergences among sector performances and individual stock movements. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Oxford Industries Hits New 52-Week High of Rs.4.54 Marking Significant Market Milestone
item.description: Oxford Industries has reached a new 52-week high of Rs.4.54, reflecting a notable moment in its trading history as the stock demonstrates strong momentum amid a mixed market environment. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Wim Plast . Stock Falls to 52-Week Low of Rs.444 Amid Prolonged Downtrend
item.description: Wim Plast . has reached a new 52-week low of Rs.444, marking a significant decline as the stock continues a nine-day losing streak. This latest price point reflects ongoing pressures within the diversified consumer products sector, with the stock trading below all major moving averages and underperforming key market indices over the past year. Time: 2 hours ago

item.title: Cupid Stock Surges 361.5% in Six Months, Outperforming Market Benchmarks
item.description: Cupid has delivered an exceptional return of 361.5% over the past six months, significantly outpacing broader market indices and its sector peers. This remarkable performance highlights the stock’s strong momentum amid a challenging market environment, driven by a combination of bullish technical indicators and robust financial fundamentals. Time: 2 hours ago
